channel.title: CVE Feed for Oracle Corporation -- Primavera Unifier
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Oracle Corporation -- Primavera Unifier

item.title: CVE-2018-2620|2024-10-03T20:40:27.633Z -- oracle%20corporation -- primavera%20unifier
item.description: Vulnerability in the Primavera Unifier component of Oracle Construction and Engineering Suite (subcomponent: Platform). Supported versions that are affected are 10.x, 15.x, 16.x and 17.x. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows low privileged attacker with network access via HTTP to compromise Primavera Unifier. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized creation, deletion or modification access to critical data or all Primavera Unifier accessible data as well as unauthorized access to critical data or complete access to all Primavera Unifier accessible data. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 8.1 (Confidentiality and Integrity impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:L/PR:L/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:H/A:N).
